content.title: Hanging Straight Leg Hip Raise Instructions

items: Find a sturdy pull-up bar and hang from it with your arms straight and your feet off the ground.
Engage your core and lift your legs up until they are parallel to the ground.
Slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position, keeping them straight and your core engaged.
Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
